评论详情: My favorite top - beautiful swirl of colors, looks good in lots of different combinations, fits well, soft, and I get lots of compliments on it.

评论概述: Nice top and true to size!
评论详情: I love this top.  It is the size I wanted and it seems to be well-made.  It has stood up to several washings so far.  I'll be ordering more in different designs.  Very pleased.

The fabric is very soft, and the colors are vibrant!!  The only thing I didn’t like is that the tie dye is printed on the fabric and not actually dyed.  Otherwise I think it’s made well and I like the overall shape of the shirt. I feel like it runs a little big. I’m 5’4, 230lbs and a pear shape and i normally wear a Xl and this one is a little looser than I would have expected.  Great value for what you get.

I HAVE ORDERED SEVERAL SHIRTS FROM THIS COMPANY AND I LOVE THEM!  I HAVE RECEIVED MANY COMPLIMENTS.SOFT AND FIT SO WONDERFUL.  OH......AND WASH UP FANTASTIC!  I DO NOT PUT MY IN THE DRYER, SO I CANNOT COMMENT ON HOW THEY DRY!
I wear this top with many colors. Very comfortable and hangs just right. Very flattering.

I love the color and pattern of this shirt. I have another print of this style and it is one of my favorite shirts to wear. This one is nice and comfortable everywhere but in the arms. The shirt is cut like a plus size, but the sleeves are not. Causes the fabric to ride up and bunch up under the arms. It fits true to size everywhere but the sleeves.
This fits great and looks wonderful!

评论概述: Quickly became one of my favorites!
评论详情: I was so happy with the quality of this shirt! The material is soft and silky. It is thick enough that you can't see through it, but it is not hot. After many washes in the washing machine and tossing it in the dryer, it did not shrink, color didn't fade, and it held it's shape.  I dressed it up, or down with jeans, flannels, sweaters, etc. I have lost weight since buying this shirt, and am looking at ordering it in a smaller size, which is what prompted me to write a review. The shirt was very flattering and I received many compliments on it. As a person that wore a 3X/4X, it is hard to find a nice t-shirt sometimes. And at a great price too.
Not a comfortable material; not breathable. I would like to see more substantial Cotton T-shirts again!
Bought this shirt a couple years ago and it still is in good shape! It is comfortable and made of a breathable material!! Pretty design!
Absolutely my new favorite shirt
I normally buy 1X, but with item I went with 2X, and it fit perfectly.
Tie dye is always a risk but this on turned out! Cute cut, pretty colors.

After you wash it you can tell a big difference in the material. The material sticks together all over as if you didn't use a dryer sheet. I decided to keep the shirt as a cleaning the house/lawn shirt.
fits great

I am so impressed!  Most tops leave little room for a bust, belly or hips, but this one fits fairly well at the shoulders, without being too tight everywhere else.  It has a nice v neck that isn't too low.  It is usually hard to find these features in a top that has actual sleeves, instead of little baby sleeves.The only complaint I have, if you can call it that, is that I thought the dark part of the print was navy, but it is actually black, which is okay--it will go with more things in my closet that way anyway.
Super soft. Every time I wear it lots of compliments. Great value and perfect texture. Will definitely order more from company.

love this shirt!  Its very soft and the blue camo design is different, more fun then my usual solid colors. Ordered my regular size and it fit as expected.  I've ordered a few Ritera tops and will continue to do so.  They wash just fine and i've had no problems with them.
It was a bit thinner than I expected…I bought two, one for a friend. We are keeping them because the look of the top just fine while wearing.
They're very comfortable, and I like the fact that they're a bit longer than a regular T-shirt.

评论概述: I liked it so much I ordered more
评论详情: Love, love this shirt. It's very soft and the colors are vibrant.  As a long torso girl I love the extra length on these shirts. They fit well and are true to size. I usually stray away from V necks as they ate usually a little low for my taste but these are perfect.  Seriously just buy it. It's really a perfect shirt for any occasion.

Both shirts are beautiful! The material is soft & holds its shape well. I like my tops a bit loose, but could have easily gotten a 3x instead of a 4x, as you can see by the amount of material I've gathered at my waistline.  Will buy more. The print is bright & fun! The teal color is rich & vibrant!
I love the feel of this top; feels so soft. True to size. Good quality of material.

I bought the black t-shirt with the white, jagged, horizontal stripes several months ago, and I love it.  So, i decided to purchase this lovely caramel colored t-shirt. I made sure the description was the same, with regard to what it is made of.  Nope. I got a plane old t-shirt fabric shirt. Ugh!!!  The black and white shirt is 95% rayon, 5% spandex, and it feels great, looks great, and I love wearing it.  I bought this caramel colored shirt, which said the same blend, and it’s not. It’s 65% polyester, 35% rayon, 5% spandex. And it fits clingy. Ugh  The black and white shirt does not cling. It hangs so nicely, and even feels dressy, if that makes any sense.  Here’s my thing: why say it’s this, when it’s not. Ugh!!!  Now I can’t order more because I have no idea what I’m getting.  Just tell the truth so that we buy what we want to buy.  Also, I do not pay $25 for a regular ole t-shirt. A graphic tee, maybe.  This is a waste of my time. Won’t be ordering more.
love the shirt, very comfortable. probably could go down a size. material very soft. would buy again.

This is a perfect little shimmery casual tshirt. Fits well, and is long enough to fit me correctly. I run into problems with shirts being too short, and this fit great. It’s comfy and easy to launder.  The fabric is nice, not itchy or too clingy. A great shirt!

It doesn’t look like the girl in the picture when I wear it. It actually looks like pajamas to me. The shirt is very soft so I love that and it doesn’t wrinkle and the quality is good but I just don’t like how it looks like pajamas.
Great fit, not too long or too short. Material is polyester but can not tell at a glance.

I waited until I wore this a few times before reviewing. The colors are staying vibrant after washing and it’s still as soft as the first time I wore it. Great fit that balances between being pleasantly roomy without being bulky. It’s also surprisingly breathable in the Southern heat.
It’s awesome coloring is great, nice soft material, looks good on me. I would definitely buy another one. It’s true to size also!
Comfy. Fades quickly.
I like the pattern. The style. The fabric. The fit. The price.  Hope it washes well.
like how it fits

I have worn this about 4-5 times so far. It has washed well on cool/ gentle: I put in dryer on low heat for only 5 minutes then hang it to dry completely- love the colors with jeans. I did order two sizes larger than recommended and am so glad I did !!

评论概述: Almost returned it but glad I didn't
评论详情: When I ordered the shirt, I thought it was a different blend fabric. So when I opened the package last week and it looked shiny, like a performance knit, I was disappointed. I ordered the black with rainbow stripes. Then I tried it on, thinking it would fit weird and I would be able to return for more than just one reason. But ... I liked the fit. Loose, but not sloppy. Sleeves were comfy. Length was nice and covered my tummy. And it was lightweight without being clingy and sheer. So, I decided to keep it and make it a casual work blouse, because it was a bit shiny. One wash, and the shiny faded a bit. And it felt more comfy. So, I washed it again. Perfect. It is now my favorite shirt, perfect for summer. Over the weekend, I wore it with cutoffs and flip flops, then put on jeans and white slip on tennis shoes when evening came. But, it also is cute with skinny pants and heels for work. Fabric is light and breathable. Does NOT feel like sticky polyester when you get hot and sweaty. I am buying more.

Right size and looks just like the picture shows. Colors are very bright and vibrant. Just don't care for the material very much. Will have to wear in the late spring or early summer. Long enough to wear with leggings as well.
Order about 2 sizes up if you want a comfortable, relaxed fit. I'll have to return this for a bigger size as my usual size of this top is WAY too tight.
The shirt was perfect to size & soft comfy material.  Definitely a must!

评论概述: It’s a pretty top, too dressy for work though
评论详情: I like this shirt, it fits nice. But it is too dressy for every day, and it’s too dressy for every day work.  I’m going to keep it anyways.  I could wear this to a New Year’s Eve party or to a really nice restaurant.
Light weight fits great, bought another different pattern

Amazon recommended a 2XL but it’s way too big. However it is good quality, not see through and the material is very soft. I bought an XL in another color and it fits great. Not dinging this product because it’s Amazon’s fault for recommending the wrong size.
When I opened it and felt it wasn’t cotton I was very disappointed but I tried it on and it was soft and not clingy.  I’ve worn it and I like it
To find a cute, comfortable, fun shirt that fits over my belly, and is the perfect length to wear with leggings, was a great surprise! I will absolutely be buying more from this company!

I love this shirt. The material is light weight, cool and perfect for summer. The colors of the flowers are very pretty and can either be dressed up with a skirt/slacks or dressed down with jeans/shorts. Very comfortable to wear and not clingy. I wear mine a lot!
Fits ok
Great price and good fit.
Love the design and fabric. Fits perfectly
I like it. Its long enongh. Im 5'11" and it goes to my butt. It runs a little big.
I have now ordered 4 of these.  They are comfortable the fit is great, and they do not shrink.  I will most likely buy more.
Get a size up. Very clingy. Nice shirt otherwise
Very soft shirt , love the v neck and it fits nicely

Clothes never fit me, except these and that’s why I’ve purchased three in different designs! They hang nicely, they are sturdy, I received tons of compliments from kids and adults as a teacher, and I don’t feel fat in them!
This fit me perfectly and I love the colors! Bright and I always get compliments.

The description says that the top is a 1X, when it arrived the actual product was marked as an XL. 1X and XL are not cut the same, so the fit was not what was expected. Seems like a nice top, but I would not have ordered it if the description said XL.

Cute top for my fiance. Normally, she doesn't like flower-y tops, but she like the color contrasts this one has, adding that it looked pretty. She noted how soft it was and added that it does a solid job of hiding muffin tops while still being nicely form fitting on her (not too loose/tight). She's happy with it, so its a win from me too.
Nice light weight top.Good fit.

I’m used to buying these shirts online and they come in too thin, or the sleeves are too long/too short. Not this top! The white solid v-neck was the perfect fit! It’s flattering, isn’t too thin, and the material felt soft even after washing. I’ll be buying more if I find more color options.
This shirt is very cute and comfortable. I don't find it to be as slouchy as the display picture, but I am very long waisted so maybe that is why.
Fit is true to size. Soft fabric, very comfortable. Will be buying more colors.

I love how soft it is, just has a very light comfortable feel. I am 4’11 and weigh roughly 225 pounds. Finding a top that fits is very difficult when you have to buy online. Since I am so short, everything that I purchase goes down to my knees and looks like a dress. Finding a petite shirt is hard. This top is the perfect length. I can’t say enough about how much I  love it!
Love the look of a shirt in the feel. Thought I was ordering the color dark plum but it’s more of a gray. And the size runs small.
It wears like scrubs in a medical office. The fabric is not a T-shirt material, and the cut of the shirt is weird.
Fits perfect.
Wore it to a work function and it was cool and comfy.  Not snug but was a good fit to the body.
I love this T-shirt. I wear it all the time. I get lots of compliments about how pretty it is. The colors are vibrant. I thought I had a better picture but I didn't.
I love the colors and v neck, fits well and looks nice!
Love this pink camouflage, Very cute and comfy.
They weren't the greatest quality shirts and had no shape. The material was soft and seemed comfortable. I ultimately had to return because the sizing was off, I fell in between 2 sizes
This shirt is very thin, silky and clingy....would be ok for someone slimmer but as a plus size person, I wouldn't recommend...I look for shirts that help hide my belly, not cling to it even more!
I'm 5"11 so it's a little short, but I still like it.

I'm a 1X and hate how a lot of shirts cling to all my curves since I lack a butt. These shirts are comfortable, lightweight, breathable, dry quickly, and look great on me. I've bought 5 or 6 now in different designs and I think they make me feel more beautiful in my day-to-day wear or out and about. I look like a schlub in a t-shirt, so these are my go-tos now. I almost feel like when a guy can just grab any outfit and go, rather than looking through my closet and feel like I have nothing to wear 😆. Now I have these and still considering getting more down the road.
Love material,  not true to size 3x fits more like 2x

I typically wear a 2x. Sometimes, but not often a 1x. I have bought several shirts from this company and love the fit, but for me its a 4x. So order accordingly. I have not been unhappy with the 4 shirts I purchased at all. Nice material, flattering fit, washes up nicely.

评论概述: I love this top. Received lots of compliments on it.

I get tons of compliments on this top.  It is super cute, comfortable, and can be worn casually or business casually for work.
Fits a little tight in the breast area

Love this shirt! So happy with the purchase. The cut is flattering, it’s very soft and beautiful colors.

I love the pretty flowered print of this top… wash delicate and hang to dry no wrinkles and ready to wear! I could have used a smaller size but was asked to order larger than my real size.

These shirts are very comfortable and are a great fit. Wash well. 100% recommend.
It is very nice looking. It is soft. It ran a little small. I would be head over heels in love with it if it was a little larger.
Great colors, great shirt! Would buy again. Highly recommend

I bought four of these shirts in different colors and patterns.  They all fit well, the fabric starts out really nice but after several washings (I wear them almost everyday) this summer (2022) I’ve noticed the fabric has gotten kind of “fuzzy” looking. A couple of them also have tiny little pill balls on them.  I would definitely say these are a one year top.  I’ll probably purchase them again, because they fit nice and don’t wrinkle.

I ended up getting the 2X. Usually I wear a 2X or 3X. So, the fit is really nice. The material is very silky like, but stretchy, almost like a nightgown material. But the tan and white leopard print looks fine with that material.
This fits just like it should. Very comfortable shirt, and I get lots of compliments on the color.
This fits perfectly and material is wonderful.

Purchased similar styles and had good luck, decent quality/fit for price. This one not so much. Wear a 20 comfortably in most other brands. 4X in this brand snug fit through waist/tummy. Going up another size would be sloppy in shoulders/bust (I'm a C). Would not buy again. Will keep only to wear around house because I prematurely threw away packaging.
